forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 36F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally clear. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 3C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 38F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 25F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 28F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 0C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 4C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 2C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 36F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
